mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.company_id, a.title, a.description, a."location", a.max_participants, a.created_at, a.activity_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, ( SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(1), 0) FROM public.reservations r WHERE r.activity_id = a.id AND r.status = 'confirmed' ) AS current_participants FROM public.activities a ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT a.id, a.company_id, a.title, a.description, a."location", a.max_participants, a.created_at, a.activity_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, ( SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(1), 0) FROM public.reservations r WHERE r.activity_id = a.id AND r.status = 'confirmed' ) AS current_participants FROM public.activities a
a."location" ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
